featured.text: He was the grandson of a slave.
A slave raid starts with an assembly of the Amazon warriors outside their own nest.
When the slave owners realized the power of Capoeira, they began to punish those who practiced it.
He was also known to have entertained the slaves who built the pyramids.

other.text: Few people know, however, that the author was the grandson of a Haitian slave.
The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.
In the sixteenth century, when the Africans were taken from their homes to Brazil against their will and kept in slavery, Capoeira began to take form among the community of slaves for self-defense.

definition.zh_def: 奴隸；被迫為他人工作的人，通常沒有自由和權利。
definition.en_def: A person who is legally owned by another and is forced to work for them without pay.
definition.example: The history of slavery is a painful chapter in many countries.
